fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Public Health
eu_initiatives:
Aerosol Dispenser Directive (75/324/EEC) 
Cosmetic Products Regulation (1223/2009/EEC) 
4151/00 rev 1
goals__remit:
Emmace Consulting has an excellent knowledge in analysing and evaluating inhalers/aerosol products, prototypes and explorative formulations by different experimental methods. Emmace Consulting offer and perform these specialized studies in our laboratories which are dedicated for inhaler performance testing. 
For particle sizing of the aerosol that leaves the inhaler device or the aerosol product, we use cascade impactors for aerodynamic characterisation. We also perform Laser Diffraction measurements, plume geometry/spray pattern, delivered dose uniformity testing, and determination of the air flow resistance of the inhalation product. Emmace also use in-vivo realistic methods for estimating the lung deposition
